Primary Energy: Space 2 (sensing magical auras) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Self (30 feet sensing range) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 4 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Sense presence of magic within 30ft. Can use action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object that bears magic, and learn its energy type(s). Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes
